<div id="aboutPage">
					<section>

					<div class="aboutPageSection">
						<h3>History of Ascension</h3>
						<p>Ascension music festival was started in the early 2000s where it became well known for showcasing some of the best artists in the underground hip hop scene, with it's first ever headliner being non other than MF DOOM, a legend in the underground scene.  Over the years the festival has grown tremendously and is now known for its tendancy to shine light on lesser known artists with exceptional talent and unique sounds. Some of the most prominent artists featured over the years include J-Dilla, SLick Rick and Q-tip.
						It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. </p>

						<figure>
							<img id="doomPic" alt="MF DOOM on stage" src="./Assets/Images/doom.png">
							<figcaption>Ascension 2001, the beginning.</figcaption>
						</figure>
					</div>

					<div class="aboutPageSection">
						<h3>Our Mission</h3>
						<p>Our mission here at ascension festival is to showcase the best hip hop artists from the underground scene. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
						At Ascension music festival we guarantee:
						<ul id="gList">
							<li>Quality performances from the world's best artists</li>
							<li>Exposure to exceptional up and coming talent</li>
							<li>Good vibes and mind-blowing levels of energy</li>
						</ul>
						</p>
					</div>
